q.en: How do you prepare for the speaking test?
q.uz: Siz speaking imtihoniga qanday tayyorgarlik ko'rasiz?

q.en: What is the most challenging part of the IELTS exam for you?
q.uz: Siz uchun IELTS imtihonining eng qiyin qismi nima?

q.en: Describe a time you used English to solve a problem.
q.uz: Muammoni hal qilish uchun Ingliz tilidan qanday foydalanganingizni tasvirlang.

q.en: Which area of mathematics interests you the most and why?
q.uz: Qaysi matematika sohasi sizni eng ko'p qiziqtiradi va nega?

q.en: Describe a challenging math problem you've solved and how you approached it.
q.uz: Siz hal qilgan qiyin matematik muammoni va unga qanday yondashganingizni tasvirlang.

q.en: How do you see mathematics being applied in real-world scenarios?
q.uz: Matematikaning haqiqiy hayotda qo'llanilishiga qanday qaraysiz?

q.en: What is your favorite mathematical theorem or concept?
q.uz: Sizning sevimli matematik teorema yoki mavzularingiz haqida aytib bering.

q.en: What current economic issue do you find most pressing?
q.uz: Sizni eng ko'p qiziqtiradigan joriy iqtisodiy muammo nima?

q.en: How do supply and demand affect market prices?
q.uz: Taklif va talab bozor narxlariga qanday ta'sir qiladi?

q.en: Discuss the role of government in a market economy.
q.uz: Bozor iqtisodiyotida hukumatning roli haqida muhokama qiling.

q.en: What aspect of aerospace engineering fascinates you the most?
q.uz: Aerokosmik muhandisligining qaysi jihati sizni eng ko'p qiziqtiradi?

q.en: Describe a significant innovation in aerospace technology.
What challenges do aerospace engineers face today?
q.uz: Aerokosmik muhandislar bugungi kunda qanday qiyinchiliklarga duch kelmoqdalar?

q.en: If you could design any aircraft or spacecraft, what would it be?
q.uz: Agar siz har qanday samolyot yoki kosmik kemani loyihalashtirish qobiliyatiga ega bo'lsangiz, u nima bo'lardi?

q.en: What is your understanding of supervised learning vs. unsupervised learning?
q.uz: Supervised va unsupervised learning haqida qanday tushunchangiz bor?

q.en: Describe a real-world application of machine learning you find interesting.
q.uz: Machine learningdagi sizni qiziqtiradigan hayotiy tadbiqlarini tasvirlang.

q.en: What are some ethical considerations in AI and machine learning?
q.uz: AI va machine learning sohasida qanday etik jihatlarga e'tibor berish lozim?
